test_cases.question: What are the main features of the product?
test_cases.expected_answer: The product includes feature A, feature B, and feature C. Feature A allows users to do X, feature B enables Y functionality, and feature C provides Z capabilities.

test_cases.question: How do I get started?
test_cases.expected_answer: To get started, you need to create an account, verify your email, and complete the initial setup. The process takes approximately 5 minutes.

test_cases.question: What are the pricing plans?
test_cases.expected_answer: We offer three pricing plans: Basic ($9/month), Pro ($29/month), and Enterprise (custom pricing). Each plan includes different features and usage limits.

test_cases.question: How does the API work?
test_cases.expected_answer: The API uses RESTful endpoints with JSON payloads. Authentication is done via API keys. You can make requests to endpoints like /api/v1/users, /api/v1/data, etc. Rate limits apply based on your plan.
